name: Chipotle: Demo
description:
Play as an alien in a world invaded by humans. Fight the birds and the eagles and get the high score.

Dev Note: This is my first ever game, and this is only the demo version. The full version will be free and will come soon. I know there are a lot of bugs and some things are not there. Animations and AI for the boss will come out with the beta. If you enjoy this pls play that one too.
Credits  for some of the sprites:  ElectricPhantom43

controls: 

WJumpARightSCrouchDLeftRight Mouse ButtonShoot Bullets
